title: Day 16 - The Man in the Fields
itunes:title: Day 16 - The Man in the Fields
itunes:subtitle: The Bad Days
description:
What lengths would you go to for your health? Your finances? Your very life? If you think you can manage it, perhaps there is a game you might play...

***
